text:
On a small % of conversions the command line FOP/Java process will hang & never 
complete. The PDF seems to be created successfully, without errors or anything 
unusual even in the debug mode. Rerunning of the same file works fine.

JRE 1.3, w/ encryption.
creator: rneilands@pulsemining.com.au
pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
text: I make all tests using command line with FOP 0.94. Never seen that behaviour

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
